verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these כֶּ֧רֶם <S%H3754><s%> had a vineyard הָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> had לְנָב֥וֹת <S%H5022><s%> [that] Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֖י <S%H3158><s%> the Jezreelite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּיִזְרְעֶ֑אל <S%H3157><s%> which [was] in Jezreel אֵ֚צֶל <S%H681><s%> hard by הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> the palace אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אַחְאָ֣ב <S%H256><s%> And Ahab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָב֣וֹת ׀ <S%H5022><s%> unto Naboth לֵאמֹר֩ ׀ <S%H559><s%> saying תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לִּ֨י אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּרְמְךָ֜ <S%H3754><s%> me thy vineyard וִֽיהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> may have לִ֣י לְגַן־ <S%H1588><s%> that I may have it for a garden יָרָ֗ק <S%H3419><s%> of herbs כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> it קָרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> because it [is] near אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> unto בֵּיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> my house וְאֶתְּנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> and I will give לְךָ֙ תַּחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> place כֶּ֖רֶם <S%H3754><s%> vineyard ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> thee for it a better מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> than אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> if ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> than it [or] if it seem good בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> to thee אֶתְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> I will give לְךָ֥ כֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of it in money מְחִ֥יר <S%H4242><s%> thee the worth זֶֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> he

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said נָב֖וֹת <S%H5022><s%> And Naboth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> to Ahab חָלִ֤ילָה <S%H2486><s%> forbid לִּי֙ מֵֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִתִּתִּ֛י <S%H5414><s%> it me that I should give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance אֲבֹתַ֖י <S%H1><s%> of my fathers לָֽךְ׃

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> came אַחְאָ֨ב <S%H256><s%> And Ahab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into בֵּית֜וֹ <S%H1004><s%> into his house סַ֣ר <S%H5620><s%> heavy וְזָעֵ֗ף <S%H2198><s%> and displeased עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> because of the word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> had spoken אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about נָבוֹת֙ <S%H5022><s%> which Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֔י <S%H3158><s%> the Jezreelite וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> to him for he had said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> I will not give לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> thee the inheritance אֲבוֹתָ֑י <S%H1><s%> of my fathers וַיִּשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> And he laid him down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because מִטָּת֔וֹ <S%H4296><s%> upon his bed וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> and turned away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> his face וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אָ֥כַל <S%H398><s%> and would eat לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> no bread

וַתָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> But אִיזֶ֣בֶל <S%H348><s%> But Jezebel אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> to him and said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How זֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> he רוּחֲךָ֣ <S%H7307><s%> unto him Why is thy spirit סָרָ֔ה <S%H5620><s%> so sad וְאֵינְךָ֖ <S%H369><s%> you are not אֹכֵ֥ל <S%H398><s%> that thou eatest לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And he said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <S%H413><s%> to her כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אֲ֠דַבֵּר <S%H1696><s%> unto her Because I spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָב֨וֹת <S%H5022><s%> unto Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֜י <S%H3158><s%> the Jezreelite וָאֹ֣מַר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֗וֹ תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> unto him Give לִּ֤י אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּרְמְךָ֙ <S%H3754><s%> me thy vineyard בְּכֶ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for money א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if חָפֵ֣ץ <S%H2655><s%> or else if it please אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> I אֶתְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> thee I will give לְךָ֥ כֶ֖רֶם <S%H3754><s%> thee [another] vineyard תַּחְתָּ֑יו <S%H8478><s%> Thahash וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> for it and he answered לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> I will not give לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3754><s%> thee my vineyard

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about אִיזֶ֣בֶל <S%H348><s%> And Jezebel אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> you עַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> now תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> unto him Dost thou now govern מְלוּכָ֖ה <S%H4410><s%> the kingdom עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel ק֤וּם <S%H6965><s%> abide אֱכָל־ <S%H398><s%> [and] eat לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> bread וְיִטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> be merry לִבֶּ֔ךָ <S%H3820><s%> and let thine heart אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> I will give לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֶּ֖רֶם <S%H3754><s%> thee the vineyard נָב֥וֹת <S%H5022><s%> of Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִֽי׃ <S%H3158><s%> the Jezreelite

וַתִּכְתֹּ֤ב <S%H3789><s%> So she wrote סְפָרִים֙ <S%H5612><s%> letters בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> in Ahab's וַתַּחְתֹּ֖ם <S%H2368><s%> [them] with his seal בְּחֹתָמ֑וֹ <S%H2856><s%> and sealed וַתִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent [הַסְפָרִים כ] (סְפָרִ֗ים <S%H5612><s%> letters ק) אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַזְקֵנִ֤ים <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַֽחֹרִים֙ <S%H2715><s%> and to the nobles אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּעִיר֔וֹ <S%H5892><s%> that [were] in his city הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> dwelling אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with נָבֽוֹת׃ <S%H5022><s%> with Naboth

וַתִּכְתֹּ֥ב <S%H3789><s%> And she wrote בַּסְּפָרִ֖ים <S%H5612><s%> in the letters לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying קִֽרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> Proclaim צ֔וֹם <S%H6685><s%> a fast וְהוֹשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H3427><s%> and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָב֖וֹת <S%H5022><s%> Naboth בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> on high הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> among the people

וְ֠הוֹשִׁיבוּ <S%H3427><s%> And set שְׁנַ֨יִם <S%H8147><s%> two אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> men בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons בְלִיַּעַל֮ <S%H1100><s%> of Belial נֶגְדּוֹ֒ <S%H5048><s%> before וִיעִדֻ֣הוּ <S%H5749><s%> before him to bear witness לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> against him saying בֵּרַ֥כְתָּ <S%H1288><s%> Thou didst blaspheme אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king וְהוֹצִיאֻ֥הוּ <S%H3318><s%> And [then] carry him out וְסִקְלֻ֖הוּ <S%H5619><s%> and stone וְיָמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> him that he may die

וַיַּעֲשׂוּ֩ <S%H6213><s%> did אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> the men עִיר֜וֹ <S%H5892><s%> of his city הַזְּקֵנִ֣ים <S%H2205><s%> [even] the elders וְהַחֹרִ֗ים <S%H2715><s%> and the nobles אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> who were the inhabitants בְּעִיר֔וֹ <S%H5892><s%> in his city כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁלְחָ֥ה <S%H7971><s%> had sent אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> as אִיזָ֑בֶל <S%H348><s%> as Jezebel כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who כָּתוּב֙ <S%H3789><s%> unto them [and] as it [was] written בַּסְּפָרִ֔ים <S%H5612><s%> in the letters אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who שָׁלְחָ֖ה <S%H7971><s%> which she had sent אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

קָרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> They proclaimed צ֑וֹם <S%H6685><s%> a fast וְהֹשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H3427><s%> and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָב֖וֹת <S%H5022><s%> Naboth בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> on high הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> among the people

וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> And there came שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> in two הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> men בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> children בְלִיַּעַל֮ <S%H1100><s%> of Belial וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> and sat נֶגְדּוֹ֒ <S%H5048><s%> before וַיְעִדֻהוּ֩ <S%H5749><s%> witnessed אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> men הַבְּלִיַּ֜עַל <S%H1100><s%> of Belial אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָב֗וֹת <S%H5022><s%> against him [even] against Naboth נֶ֤גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> in the presence of the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying בֵּרַ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> did blaspheme נָב֛וֹת <S%H5022><s%> Naboth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king וַיֹּצִאֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> Then they carried him forth מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> out לָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיִּסְקְלֻ֥הוּ <S%H5619><s%> and stoned בָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> him with stones וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> that he died

וַֽיִּשְׁלְח֖וּ <S%H7971><s%> Then they sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִיזֶ֣בֶל <S%H348><s%> to Jezebel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying סֻקַּ֥ל <S%H5619><s%> is stoned נָב֖וֹת <S%H5022><s%> Naboth וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and is dead

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard אִיזֶ֔בֶל <S%H348><s%> And it came to pass when Jezebel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for סֻקַּ֥ל <S%H5619><s%> was stoned נָב֖וֹת <S%H5022><s%> that Naboth וַיָּמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> and was dead וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אִיזֶ֜בֶל <S%H348><s%> that Jezebel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחְאָ֗ב <S%H256><s%> to Ahab ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise רֵ֞שׁ <S%H3423><s%> take possession אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֶּ֣רֶם ׀ <S%H3754><s%> of the vineyard נָב֣וֹת <S%H5022><s%> of Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֗י <S%H3158><s%> the Jezreelite אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which מֵאֵן֙ <S%H3985><s%> which he refused לָתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> to give לְךָ֣ בְכֶ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> thee for money כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> for נָב֛וֹת <S%H5022><s%> for Naboth חַ֖י <S%H2416><s%> is not alive כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> but מֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> but dead

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּשְׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> And it came to pass when Ahab כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead נָב֑וֹת <S%H5022><s%> that Naboth וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up אַחְאָ֗ב <S%H256><s%> that Ahab לָרֶ֛דֶת <S%H3381><s%> to go down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כֶּ֛רֶם <S%H3754><s%> to the vineyard נָב֥וֹת <S%H5022><s%> of Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֖י <S%H3158><s%> the Jezreelite לְרִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to take possession ס

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֵלִיָּ֥הוּ <S%H452><s%> came to Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֖י <S%H8664><s%> the Tishbite לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise רֵ֗ד <S%H3381><s%> go down לִקְרַ֛את <S%H7125><s%> to meet אַחְאָ֥ב <S%H256><s%> Ahab מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> which [is] in Samaria הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> behold בְּכֶ֣רֶם <S%H3754><s%> behold [he is] in the vineyard נָב֔וֹת <S%H5022><s%> of Naboth אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יָ֥רַד <S%H3381><s%> whither he is gone down שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֨ <S%H1696><s%> And thou shalt speak אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> to him לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הֲרָצַ֖חְתָּ <S%H7523><s%> Hast thou killed וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also יָרָ֑שְׁתָּ <S%H3423><s%> and also taken possession וְדִבַּרְתָּ֨ <S%H1696><s%> ?
